LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT /* COGCntsMapper.getBoardListCnt */ COUNT(*) FROM CO_BOARD_MST A WHERE 1 = 1 AND LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND TYPE_CD = #{typeCd}

SELECT /* COGBoardMapper.selectBoardDtl */ SEQ , LANG_CD , TITL , CNTS , TYPE_CD , YEAR , FILE_SEQ , PC_THUMB_FILE_SEQ , MO_THUMB_FILE_SEQ , READ_CNT , POST_STRT_DTM , POST_END_DTM , ODTM_YN , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME , REG_IP , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME , MOD_IP , MOD_DTM , MAIN_YN , TOP_YN , FAQ_TYPE FROM CO_BOARD_MST A WHERE SEQ = #{detailsKey}
